label: music
title: Update About My Life
description: Wraith talk. To succeed you must believe. When you believe, you will succeed. Another one. They will try to close the door on you, just open it. They never said winning was easy. Some people can’t handle success, I can. Cloth talk. Celebrate success right, the only way, apple. The ladies always say Khaled you smell good, I use no cologne. Cocoa butter is the key. You see that bamboo behind me though, you see that bamboo? Ain’t nothin’ like bamboo. Bless up. I’m giving you cloth talk, cloth. Special cloth alert, cut from a special cloth.
